xai2shiny
part of the DrWhy.AI developed by the MI^2 DataLab 1.0.0
  • Reference

    • xai2shiny introduction: Titanic dataset with multiple models

Deploy Shiny applications to the cloud

deploy_shiny.Rd

This function deploys a selected Shiny application (xai2shiny application) to the created droplet.

deploy_shiny(
  droplet,
  path,
  packages = "stats",
  port = 80,
  dir = "",
  browse = TRUE,
  ssh_user = "root"
)

Arguments

droplet

the droplet's id or droplet's object. The IP can be checked by running analogsea::droplets().
path

path to the Shiny application (xai2shiny application).
packages

vector of packages (package names) that are needed for the application to run.
port

port at which the application will run.
dir

where to deploy an app, urgent to run docklet properly
browse

a boolean, which indicates whether open the app on the web after deploying
ssh_user

the name of ssh console user, urgent to run docklet properly
